children.text: MVP Note: Parameters are taken from car manufactures webservice and do not need to be entered here.
Monthly substription. Best option for customers regularly parking at this charging point - for example weekends or during nights.
Monthly substription. Best option for frequent customers of this charging point with a regional daily driving distance.
Monthly substription. Best option for frequent customers of this charging point living/working near by.
Pay a fix price upfront and configure what you need. Best option to get optimized tariff for your requirements.
Pay what you get from our local generation. Best option if parking time is not a problem for you.
Pay a fix price upfront and get a balance of local generation and grid. Best option if suggestion fits.
Pay what you get. Best option, if parking time is unknown and charging target should be reached as quickly as possible.

Corrently Charge - Team STROMDAO
Enpulse Challenge

- integrate local generation 
- reduce scope2 emissions 
- ensure regulatory compliance   
- consult with data driven transparency
- expedite adoption with disrupting CX
MVP Note: Opens OCPP Proxy to relay communication between CP an EMT backend. Intercepts based on selected tariff requirements.
MVP Note: Parameters are taken from car manufactures webservice and do not need to be entered here.
Monthly substription. Best option for customers regularly parking at this charging point - for example weekends or during nights.
Monthly substription. Best option for frequent customers of this charging point with a regional daily driving distance.
Monthly substription. Best option for frequent customers of this charging point living/working near by.
Pay a fix price upfront and configure what you need. Best option to get optimized tariff for your requirements.
Pay what you get from our local generation. Best option if parking time is not a problem for you.
Pay a fix price upfront and get a balance of local generation and grid. Best option if suggestion fits.
Pay what you get. Best option, if parking time is unknown and charging target should be reached as quickly as possible.

Corrently Charge - Team STROMDAO
Enpulse Challenge

- integrate local generation 
- reduce scope2 emissions 
- ensure regulatory compliance   
- consult with data driven transparency
- expedite adoption with disrupting CX
MVP Note: Opens OCPP Proxy to relay communication between CP an EMT backend. Intercepts based on selected tariff requirements.
